id.dldescription: Unique Id of the animal event

animalId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related animal

herdEventId.dldescription: Unique Id of the related herd event

heatCode.dldescription: Code for the heat event from (https://test.nordiccdx.com/Help/Codeset?name=HEAT_CODE)

heatAddCode.dldescription: Additional code for the heat event from (https://test.nordiccdx.com/Help/Codeset?name=HEAT_ADD_CODE)

heatDetectionAccuracy.dldescription: What is the accuracy of the detection

heatDetectionMethod.dldescription: What is the used method fo heat (Chemical, Visual etc.)
